name: Sweetheart Catnip Cuddler
description: This adorable hand-knit heart is the perfect treat for your feline friend! Made with soft worsted-weight yarn, this simple pattern features easy shaping and straightforward construction. Fill it with stuffing, catnip, and an optional bell to create a fun and engaging toy your cat will love. Perfect for beginners and experienced knitters alike, this quick project makes a great gift or stash-buster.
full_text: This adorable hand-knit heart is the perfect treat for your feline friend! Made with soft worsted-weight yarn, this simple pattern features easy shaping and straightforward construction. Fill it with stuffing, catnip, and an optional bell to create a fun and engaging toy your cat will love. Perfect for beginners and experienced knitters alike, this quick project makes a great gift or stash-buster. Skill Level: Beginner-friendly Techniques Used: Increases, decreases, simple shaping, seaming
